name: Pick Up via Helicopter
description:
Use W/^ S/ˇ  to control the thrust. (Indicated by the bar on the right.)

Use A/< D/> to control turning.

The speed-o-meter (circle) indicates speed. Do not crash into the ground if going too fast!

Entry in Mini Jam 75: Wisdom
Limitation: Weight must be a mechanic
